channel.title: Moorish Palace on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Alhambra - Granada - Spain
item.description: We did not book our tickets for Alhambra before coming to Granada. There can be 8,000 visitors inside Alhambra in a given day. Out of those 8,000 around 6,500 are sold over internet & phone. So for us, it meant getting up early and queuing up in the morning. As it was Monday and not peak of tourist season… we were lucky. Alhambra has main 4 sites to visit. The main attraction is of course “Palacios Nazaries” the best preserved Moorish Palace in Europe.
